name: Tier 2 Melee Critical Hits (Levels 5-8)
description: Critical hit effects for melee attacks at Tier 2 (Levels 5-8). Effects are more impactful for competent adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Staggering Blow - Your powerful strike sends the target reeling. They are knocked prone and must spend half their movement to stand.
Disorienting Hit - Your devastating strike leaves your target dazed. They are stunned until the end of your next turn.
Deep Wound - Your strike opens a grievous wound. Target takes 1d8 damage at the start of each of their turns until healed or they use an action to stanch the bleeding.
Armor Breach - Your attack finds a gap and damages their protection. -2 AC until the armor is repaired.
Crippling Strike - Your blow strikes a leg or arm. Target's speed is halved until they receive healing.
Brutal Blow - Your mighty strike deals an additional 2d6 damage from the sheer force of impact.
